Topic.Title: Coca Cola to $50/- by the end of year :

Message.Msg: What about the sugar & diet soda police....KO has been airing commercials but they are low keyed commercials....they don't have the muscle like tobacco. All of the KO shareholders should write to MSNBC about the beach on Morning Joe and her disdain for Coke (not Pepsi, just Coke) and remind them that KO and other sugar products are their advertisers & what a dumb sheet she is sitting there drinking Grande coffee w/cream and sugar & her like of Vodka....like Vodka is better than Coke??? What a stupid & ugly dip she is.
